Dated: 08 August 2013
CORRIGENDUM TO CIRCULAR NO. 01/2011 DATED 06/01/2011
SUB.:- SOP ON MANAGEMENT OF DOG SQUADS FOR CIVIL
AVIATION
SECURITY AT AIRPORTS WHERE CISF IS
DEPLOYED
In partial modification to AVSEC Circular No. 01/2011 dated 06.01.2011
on the subject, the following changes are made:
DIET :   Para-7 of Circular DELETED.
DIET :   Para-7 of Circular be read as :
Dogs of Airport operations deployed for Civil Aviation Security at
airports are to be fed as per scales laid down vide MHA letter no. 18/52/87-
Med/BSF/Ration/1833/1838 dated 08.04.1999 and 72/Vet/SSB/07/Vol-
II/VC dated 30.09.2010 (Copies enclosed) and instructions therein to be
followed.
This issue with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA)
(Raja Srivastava, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
Distribution: As per attached list of distribution
